Understate: The claim may understate the seriousness of the issue of deer being struck by automobiles at the current location.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to back up the recommendation of moving the "Deer Crossing" sign.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that moving the sign to an area with less traffic will solve the problem of deer being struck by automobiles.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or solutions that are not considered in the claim.
